evidence.text:
Person B: Can you take a picture of me?
Person A: Oh.   Really? Sure, I guess so.

Person A: Not all, but I do keep Shabbat. It's mediative, it gives me a chance to unwind, to refocus. And you?
Person B: No. The whole thing always seemed like a little archaic and arbitrary and mechanical to me. No offense.
Person A: None taken, but I think it would really benefit you.
Person B: Hi, yes, I'm eavesdropping, is that okay?
Person B: Yes, of course. I find myself constantly baffled by the way the world seems to carry on like there aren't a million reasons to mourn, to be shocked, to be appalled.
